name: Politicoin
short_description: Politicoin - PBLC value added agenda promotions platform powered by users and Etherum blockchain.
description: By incorporating PUBLICAE blockchain technology and Politicoin to their advertising structures, political parties and non-governmental organisations like charities can minimize the burden of administrative advertising costs, reach a wider audience of potential donors and supporters by tokenizing their efforts as well as enable a higher level of accountability, while users can monetize their attention.
